name: liquid-ooze
caption: Liquid Ooze

effect.short: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.
effect.full:
Whenever a Pokémon would heal after hitting this Pokémon with a leeching move like []{move:absorb}, it instead loses as many [HP]{mechanic:hp} as it would usually gain.

[]{move:dream-eater} is unaffected.

flavorText:
Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages
attackers using any draining move.
